ticker: Join us for live DJs mixing every weekend!
Join our VRChat group or visit us on Bluesky for news on our next events.
Any protogens found unattended on the station concourse will be confiscated and have Windows 11 installed on them.
Please can all passengers be mindful of on-going station improvements and resist the urge to use construction cones as a hat. Thank you.

performers.name: AmberFlame
ticker: Please welcome our first DJ tonight and their first time playing at The Bass Station, Amber Flame!

performers.name: V[AI]RUS
ticker: Voted 'Most Stinky Fish' Award three years running.

performers.name: Funnel Vision
ticker: Now boarding, our final DJ of the night!
Follow Funnel Vision on Bluesky @funnelvisionvrc.bsky.social and mixcloud.com/FunnelVissionVRC
Buy one, get one free! Bass Station is now on Fridays and Saturdays!
Be sure to join our VRChat Group to see when our instances are live!
